# test program
#start to define instructions
INSTR:100
00000100000011001000		#Load memory address 200 into R0
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000110000011001001		#Load memory address 201 into R2
00000000000000000000		#HLT
01010000100000000000		#MLT R0(positive)*R2(positive)
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000100000011001011		#Load memory address 203 into R0
00000000000000000000		#HLT
01010000100000000000		#MLT R0(negative)*R2(postive)
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000100000011001011		#Load memory address 203 into R0
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000110000011001100		#Load memory address 204 into R2
00000000000000000000		#HLT
01010000100000000000		#MLT R0(negative)*R2(negative)
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000100000011001000		#Load memory address 200 into R0
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000110000011001001		#Load memory address 201 into R2
00000000000000000000		#HLT
01010100100000000000		#DVD R0(positive)/R2(positive)
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000100000011001010		#Load memory address 202 into R0
00000000000000000000		#HLT
01010100100000000000		#DVD R0(negative)/R2(positive)
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000100000011001010		#Load memory address 202 into R0
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000110000011001011		#Load memory address 203 into R2
00000000000000000000		#HLT
01010100100000000000		#DVD R0(negative)/R2(negative)
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000100000011001000		#Load memory address 200 into R0
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000110000011001001		#Load memory address 201 into R2
00000000000000000000		#HLT
01011000100000000000		#TRR R0!=R2
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000100000011001100		#Load memory address 204 into R0
00000000000000000000		#HLT
01011000100000000000		#TRR R0==R2
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000100000011001000		#Load memory address 200 into R0
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000110000011001001		#Load memory address 201 into R2
00000000000000000000		#HLT
01011100100000000000		#AND R0&R2
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000100000011001000		#Load memory address 200 into R0
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000110000011001001		#Load memory address 201 into R2
00000000000000000000		#HLT
01100000100000000000		#ORR R0|R2
00000000000000000000		#HLT
00000100000011001000		#Load memory address 200 into R0
00000000000000000000		#HLT
01100100000000000000		#NOT !R0
11011100000000000000		#END of program
DATA:200
